SELECT a.device_id , ifnull(date_format(a.request_dt, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s'),'') as request_dt , a.service_id , a.method , a.object_id , a.object_instance_id , a.resource_id , a.resource_instance_id , a.format , a.token , a.mid , a.tid , a.payload , a.result , ifnull(date_format(a.result_dt, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s'),'') as result_dt , a.reg_id , o.object_nm , r.resource_nm , d.device_serial FROM EMI_OPERATION_LOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN EMI_OBJECT_MODEL O ON A.OBJECT_ID = O.OBJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMI_RESOURCE_MODEL R ON O.OBJECT_ID = R.OBJECT_ID AND A.RESOURCE_ID = R.RESOURCE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMI_DEVICE_INFO D ON D.DEVICE_ID = A.DEVICE_ID WHERE A.device_id = #{device_id}
